The threat from Dinobot and reference to him is merely being used as direct=
 bait, given Yokoetron's name has been tossed out repeatedly as justificati=
on for events.

I have no idea what his current circumstances are at all in=
-game or on 'modern' Cybertron, but with the fact the group is several hund=
red thousand years in the past, and with the shiftings giong on in time, ev=
en LEO PRIME may not be aware of his status, if anything.

So, that lack of=
 awareness of his circumstacnes at all leads to doubt, which Dinobot can th=
en mine over for further things.  As for his 'sensei' himself being the dar=
k BLUDGEON, it just seemed appropriate, and with the Dark Decepticon Samura=
i to Counter the Autobot Ninja seemed appropriate.

I'm leaving it up to Pr=
eston if he likes this and wants to run with it for 'actuality' or whether =
it's just a very, very improvised bluff over by DINOBOT to try and goad the=
 Maximals into attacking.
